title: Drawing, 1931-64-178, 1726–31
medium:
red chalk on laid paper
(verso: red chalk, pen and ink)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Vertical format. A woman is shown standing between two figures.  Her right hand covers something carried by the left one, possibly a jar.  The upper part of another figure is shown beside her left foot.
Verso: Two studies of boys' heads, and part of a third one.  One is shown in profile, turned toward left; the other is in opposite direction and shown in three-quarter profile.
